## Regression

$$
  Y_i = \beta_0 + \beta_1 CommitedAveageAcreFeet_{i} + \delta_2 AgtoUrban_{i} + \delta_3 AgtoEnivo_{i} + \delta_4 UrbantoAg_{i} +
  \delta_5 UrbantoEnviro_{i} + \delta_6 UrbantoUrban_{i}
  + \beta_7 PDSI_{i} + \delta_(8-17) Months_{i} + \delta_(18-28) Stat_{i} + \epsilon_i
$$

```{r regression1}
reg1 <- lm(log(InflationAdjustedPricePerAnnualAcreFoot) ~ CommitedAverageAcreFeet + AgtoUrban + AgtoEnivo + UrbantoAg + UrbantoEnviro + UrbantoUrban + PDSI + Jan + Feb + Mar + Apr + May + Jun + Jul.Aug + Oct + Nov + Dec + AZ + CA + ID + MT + NM + NV + OR + TX + UT + WA + WY, data = RMasterData)
summary(reg1)


bptest(reg1)
vif(reg1)
resettest(reg1)
dwtest(reg1)
```

```{r reg2}
reg2 <- coeftest(reg1, vcov. = vcovHC(reg1, "HC1"))
reg2
```
